comments:
After opening the Preferences dialog, I try to select the File Associations 
and nothing happens the first time. I will select another Preferences option 
and then come back to the File Associations and then the dialog is displayed, 
but the list of file types and editors is narrow and some of the editors names 
are truncated. If I again go to another Preferences option and then come back 
to the File Associations, then the list of files types and editors is 
displayed at an appropriate width for me to see all of the editor names.

Here is the .log entries I get when I try to open the File Associations for 
the first time:
